document_data.name: Hazm'cri Dynasty
document_data.mainbody: The '''Hazm'cri Dynasty''' began their rule over the nation of [[Dambrath]] in [[831 DR]] and still ruled as of [[1374 DR]]. The Hazm'cri rulers were predominantly [[half-drow]].

Monarchs.Queen [[Cathtyr Shintar]]: Reigned 831 DR – [[1035 DR]]. Established her rule by betraying the [[Arkaiun]]s.
Monarchs.Queen [[Filina Shintar]]: Reigned 1035 DR – [[1040 DR]]. Assumed rule after committing matricide.
Monarchs.Queen [[Cathakay Shintar]]: Reigned 1040 DR – [[1094 DR]]. Followed in her mother's footsteps and assumed rule by committing matricide.
Monarchs.Queen [[Melanith]]: Reigned 1094 DR – [[1215 DR]]. Niece of Cathakay.
Monarchs.Queen [[Ausitil]]: Reigned 1215 DR – [[1275 DR]]. Daughter and sole heir of Melanith.
Monarchs.Queen [[Yenandra Hazm'cri]]: Reigned 1275 DR – [[1356 DR]]. Niece of Ausitil.
Monarchs.Queen [[Hasafir]]: Reigned 1356 DR – present. Assumed rule after transforming her mother Yenandra into a spectral guardian.
